entities.name: Harry Potter

attributes.physical_description: thin face, knobbly knees, black hair, bright green eyes, round glasses, lightning bolt scar on forehead

entities.description: An orphaned wizard who survived Lord Voldemort's killing curse as a baby, leaving him with a lightning-bolt scar. He discovers he is famous in the wizarding world and begins his education at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Albus Dumbledore

attributes.physical_description: tall, thin, very old, silver hair and beard long enough to tuck into belt, blue eyes behind half-moon spectacles, long crooked nose

entities.description: Headmaster of Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Considered by many the greatest wizard of modern times, famous for defeating Grindelwald in 1945 and his work on alchemy with Nicolas Flamel. The only wizard Voldemort ever feared.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Minerva McGonagall
entities.description: Deputy Headmistress of Hogwarts and Head of Gryffindor House. A strict and clever Transfiguration teacher who is also an Animagus capable of transforming into a tabby cat.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Rubeus Hagrid

attributes.physical_description: almost twice as tall as a normal man and at least five times as wide, long tangles of bushy black hair and beard, hands the size of trash can lids

entities.description: Keeper of Keys and Grounds at Hogwarts. Was expelled in his third year and had his wand snapped, but Dumbledore let him stay as gamekeeper. Extremely loyal to Dumbledore and has a fondness for dangerous creatures.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Lord Voldemort

attributes.physical_description: chalk white face with glaring red eyes and slits for nostrils like a snake

entities.description: A dark wizard who terrorized the wizarding world for years. Killed Harry's parents but mysteriously lost his powers when he tried to kill baby Harry. Exists as a shadow seeking to return to power, possessing Professor Quirrell's body.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Ronald Weasley

attributes.physical_description: tall, thin, gangling, with freckles, big hands and feet, long nose, red hair

entities.description: Harry's best friend at Hogwarts. The sixth son in the Weasley family, he feels overshadowed by his older brothers. Skilled at wizard chess.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Hermione Granger

attributes.physical_description: lots of bushy brown hair, rather large front teeth

entities.description: A highly intelligent Muggle-born witch who becomes Harry and Ron's close friend after they save her from a mountain troll. Extremely studious and knowledgeable about magic.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Severus Snape

attributes.physical_description: greasy black hair, hooked nose, sallow skin, black eyes

entities.description: Potions Master at Hogwarts and Head of Slytherin House. Appears to hate Harry but secretly protects him. Attended Hogwarts with Harry's father James, whom he loathed.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Quirinus Quirrell
entities.description: Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher at Hogwarts. Appears nervous and stuttering but is secretly hosting Voldemort on the back of his head, hidden under a turban. Attempts to steal the Sorcerer's Stone for Voldemort.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Draco Malfoy

attributes.physical_description: pale, pointed face

entities.description: A Slytherin student who becomes Harry's rival at Hogwarts. Arrogant and prejudiced against Muggle-born wizards, he comes from a wealthy pure-blood family.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Neville Longbottom

attributes.physical_description: round-faced

entities.description: A clumsy but brave Gryffindor student raised by his grandmother. Often forgetful and accident-prone, but shows courage when standing up to his friends.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Vernon Dursley

attributes.physical_description: big, beefy man with hardly any neck, very large mustache

entities.description: Harry's Muggle uncle who works as director of a drill company called Grunnings. Despises anything abnormal or magical and treats Harry poorly.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Petunia Dursley

attributes.physical_description: thin and blonde with nearly twice the usual amount of neck

entities.description: Harry's Muggle aunt and Lily Potter's sister. Resented her sister for being a witch and treats Harry with disdain.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Dudley Dursley

attributes.physical_description: large pink face, not much neck, small watery blue eyes, thick blond hair

entities.description: Harry's spoiled Muggle cousin who bullies Harry. Overweight and demanding, he is doted upon by his parents.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Lily Potter

attributes.physical_description: dark red hair, green eyes

entities.description: Harry's mother who was killed by Voldemort while protecting her son. Her sacrifice created a powerful magical protection for Harry. Was Head Girl at Hogwarts.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: James Potter I

attributes.physical_description: tall, thin, black-haired, wore glasses, untidy hair

entities.description: Harry's father who was killed by Voldemort. Was Head Boy at Hogwarts and an excellent Quidditch player. Owned an Invisibility Cloak.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Sirius Black
entities.description: A young wizard who lent Hagrid his flying motorcycle to transport baby Harry to the Dursleys.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Nicolas Flamel
entities.description: A noted alchemist and the only known maker of the Sorcerer's Stone. Over 665 years old, he is Dumbledore's partner in alchemy. Lives in Devon with his wife Perenelle.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Perenelle Flamel
entities.description: Nicolas Flamel's wife, 658 years old, who lives with him in Devon.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Fred Weasley

attributes.physical_description: red hair

entities.description: One of Ron's older twin brothers. A Beater on the Gryffindor Quidditch team, known for pranks and mischief.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: George Weasley

attributes.physical_description: red hair

entities.description: One of Ron's older twin brothers. A Beater on the Gryffindor Quidditch team, known for pranks and mischief along with Fred.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Percy Weasley

attributes.physical_description: red hair

entities.description: Ron's older brother and a Gryffindor prefect. Very proud of his position and follows rules strictly.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Ginevra Weasley

attributes.physical_description: red hair

entities.description: Ron's younger sister who is excited to see Harry Potter at King's Cross station. Too young to attend Hogwarts yet.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Molly Weasley
entities.description: Ron's mother, a plump and kind woman who helps Harry find Platform Nine and Three-Quarters and sends him a homemade sweater for Christmas.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Arthur Weasley
entities.description: Ron's father who works at the Ministry of Magic. Goes to Romania with his wife to visit their son Charlie.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Charlie Weasley
entities.description: Ron's older brother who works in Romania studying dragons. Was captain of the Gryffindor Quidditch team and could have played for England.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Bill Weasley
entities.description: Ron's oldest brother who was Head Boy at Hogwarts and now works for Gringotts in Africa.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Oliver Wood
entities.description: Captain and Keeper of the Gryffindor Quidditch team. A burly fifth-year student who is passionate about winning the Quidditch Cup.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Argus Filch
entities.description: The caretaker of Hogwarts who patrols the corridors looking for rule-breakers. Owns a cat named Mrs. Norris and knows the castle's secret passageways.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Mr. Ollivander

attributes.physical_description: old man with wide, pale eyes shining like moons

entities.description: The wandmaker who runs Ollivanders wand shop in Diagon Alley. Remembers every wand he has ever sold and provides Harry with his holly and phoenix feather wand.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Dedalus Diggle

attributes.physical_description: wears a top hat

entities.description: A wizard who bowed to Harry in a shop before Harry knew he was famous. Excitable and delighted to meet Harry in the Leaky Cauldron.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Filius Flitwick

attributes.physical_description: tiny little wizard who has to stand on a pile of books to see over his desk

entities.description: The Charms teacher at Hogwarts. Teaches students the Levitation Charm and other spells.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Pomona Sprout

attributes.physical_description: dumpy little witch

entities.description: The Herbology teacher at Hogwarts who teaches students about magical plants in the greenhouses.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Poppy Pomfrey
entities.description: The nurse at Hogwarts who runs the hospital wing. Strict but caring, she can mend broken bones quickly.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Rolanda Hooch

attributes.physical_description: short gray hair, yellow eyes like a hawk

entities.description: The flying instructor and Quidditch referee at Hogwarts.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Nicholas de Mimsy-Porpington
entities.description: The resident ghost of Gryffindor Tower. Called 'Nearly Headless Nick' because his head is almost completely severed but still attached.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Peeves

attributes.physical_description: little man with wicked dark eyes and a wide mouth

entities.description: A poltergeist who haunts Hogwarts, causing mischief and chaos. Only the Bloody Baron can control him.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Bloody Baron

attributes.physical_description: horrible ghost with blank staring eyes, gaunt face, robes stained with silver blood

entities.description: The ghost of Slytherin House. The only one who can control Peeves the poltergeist.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Fat Friar

attributes.physical_description: fat little monk

entities.description: The ghost of Hufflepuff House. Friendly and welcoming to new students.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Vincent Crabbe

attributes.physical_description: thickset

entities.description: One of Draco Malfoy's cronies. Large and stupid, he acts as Malfoy's bodyguard.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Gregory Goyle

attributes.physical_description: thickset

entities.description: One of Draco Malfoy's cronies. Large and stupid, he acts as Malfoy's bodyguard along with Crabbe.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Seamus Finnigan

attributes.physical_description: sandy-haired

entities.description: A Gryffindor student in Harry's year. His father is a Muggle and his mother is a witch.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Dean Thomas

attributes.physical_description: Black boy even taller than Ron

entities.description: A Gryffindor student in Harry's year who is a fan of West Ham soccer team and good at drawing.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Piers Polkiss

attributes.physical_description: scrawny boy with a face like a rat

entities.description: Dudley Dursley's best friend who helps him bully Harry. Usually holds people's arms behind their backs while Dudley hits them.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Firenze

attributes.physical_description: white-blond hair, palomino body, astonishingly blue eyes like pale sapphires

entities.description: A young centaur who saves Harry from Voldemort in the Forbidden Forest, defying centaur customs by helping a human.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Ronan

attributes.physical_description: red hair and beard, chestnut body with long reddish tail

entities.description: A centaur living in the Forbidden Forest who speaks cryptically about the stars and planets.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Bane

attributes.physical_description: black-haired and black-bodied, wilder-looking

entities.description: A centaur living in the Forbidden Forest who is angry at Firenze for helping Harry, believing centaurs should not interfere with human affairs.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Griphook
entities.description: A goblin who works at Gringotts bank and takes Harry and Hagrid to their vaults.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry
entities.description: A prestigious school for young witches and wizards in Britain. A vast castle with many turrets and towers, located near a great black lake and a forbidden forest.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: 4 Privet Drive
entities.description: The home of the Dursley family in Little Whinging, Surrey, where Harry Potter was raised. A perfectly normal house on a perfectly normal street.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Diagon Alley
entities.description: A hidden wizarding shopping street in London accessed through the Leaky Cauldron. Contains shops for magical supplies including Ollivanders, Gringotts, and various other stores.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Gringotts Wizarding Bank
entities.description: The wizarding bank run by goblins, located in Diagon Alley. A snowy white building with vaults deep underground, considered the safest place in the wizarding world except perhaps Hogwarts.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: The Leaky Cauldron
entities.description: A famous but grubby-looking pub in London that serves as the gateway between the Muggle world and Diagon Alley. Invisible to Muggles.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Platform Nine and Three-Quarters
entities.description: A hidden platform at King's Cross station in London, accessed by walking through the barrier between platforms nine and ten. The departure point for the Hogwarts Express.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Forbidden Forest
entities.description: A dark and dangerous forest on the Hogwarts grounds, forbidden to students. Home to centaurs, unicorns, and other magical creatures.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Godric's Hollow
entities.description: The village where the Potter family lived and where Voldemort killed James and Lily Potter.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Great Hall
entities.description: The main dining hall at Hogwarts where students eat meals and major events take place. Has a bewitched ceiling that looks like the sky outside.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Gryffindor Tower
entities.description: The living quarters for Gryffindor students at Hogwarts, accessed through a portrait of the Fat Lady. Contains a cozy common room and dormitories.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Third-Floor Corridor
entities.description: A forbidden corridor on the right-hand side of the third floor at Hogwarts, where Fluffy guards the trapdoor leading to the Sorcerer's Stone.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Ollivanders
aliases: Ollivanders: Makers of Fine Wands since 382 B.C.
entities.description: A narrow, shabby wand shop in Diagon Alley that has been making fine wands since 382 B.C.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Gryffindor House
entities.description: One of the four Hogwarts houses, valuing bravery, daring, nerve, and chivalry. Founded by Godric Gryffindor, its symbol is a lion and colors are scarlet and gold.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Slytherin House
entities.description: One of the four Hogwarts houses, valuing ambition, cunning, and resourcefulness. Founded by Salazar Slytherin, its symbol is a serpent and colors are green and silver. Has a reputation for producing dark wizards.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Hufflepuff House
entities.description: One of the four Hogwarts houses, valuing hard work, patience, justice, and loyalty. Founded by Helga Hufflepuff.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Ravenclaw House
entities.description: One of the four Hogwarts houses, valuing intelligence, creativity, learning, and wit. Founded by Rowena Ravenclaw.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Ministry of Magic
entities.description: The governing body of the wizarding community in Britain. Its main job is to keep magic hidden from Muggles.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Gryffindor Quidditch Team
entities.description: The Quidditch team representing Gryffindor House at Hogwarts, captained by Oliver Wood.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Sorcerer's Stone

attributes.creator: Nicolas Flamel
attributes.magical_properties: Transforms any metal into pure gold; produces the Elixir of Life which makes the drinker immortal

entities.description: A legendary alchemical substance created by Nicolas Flamel. The only Stone currently in existence, it was hidden at Hogwarts and protected by multiple enchantments before being destroyed.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Invisibility Cloak
entities.description: A rare and valuable cloak that belonged to James Potter and was given to Harry by Dumbledore. Makes the wearer invisible.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Mirror of Erised

attributes.magical_properties: Shows the deepest, most desperate desire of the viewer's heart

entities.description: A magnificent mirror with an ornate gold frame that shows the viewer their deepest desire. Used by Dumbledore to hide the Sorcerer's Stone.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Sorting Hat

attributes.magical_properties: Reads minds and sorts students into Hogwarts houses

entities.description: A sentient, patched and frayed wizard's hat that sorts new students into their Hogwarts houses by reading their minds.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Harry's Wand

attributes.creator: Mr. Ollivander
attributes.magical_properties: Holly and phoenix feather, eleven inches, nice and supple. Brother wand to Voldemort's wand.

entities.description: Harry Potter's wand, made of holly with a phoenix feather core. The phoenix that provided the feather gave only one other feather, which is in Voldemort's wand.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Voldemort's Wand

attributes.creator: Mr. Ollivander
attributes.magical_properties: Yew, thirteen-and-a-half inches, very powerful. Brother wand to Harry's wand.

entities.description: Lord Voldemort's wand, made of yew with a phoenix feather core. The wand that gave Harry his scar.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Nimbus Two Thousand

attributes.magical_properties: High-quality racing broomstick, fastest broom available

entities.description: A top-of-the-line racing broomstick given to Harry by Professor McGonagall for use as Gryffindor Seeker.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Put-Outer
entities.description: A silver device resembling a cigarette lighter that Dumbledore uses to extinguish and restore street lamps.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Remembrall

attributes.magical_properties: Turns red when the holder has forgotten something

entities.description: A glass ball that turns red when the holder has forgotten something. Given to Neville by his grandmother.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Fluffy

attributes.magical_abilities: Three-headed guard dog that falls asleep when music is played

entities.description: A giant three-headed dog owned by Hagrid, used to guard the trapdoor leading to the Sorcerer's Stone. Falls asleep when music is played.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Hedwig

attributes.physical_description: beautiful snowy owl

entities.description: Harry's pet snowy owl, given to him by Hagrid as a birthday present. Used to deliver mail.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Scabbers

attributes.physical_description: fat gray rat

entities.description: Ron Weasley's pet rat, inherited from his brother Percy. Sleeps most of the time.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Norbert
entities.description: A Norwegian Ridgeback dragon hatched by Hagrid from an egg he won in a card game. Sent to Charlie Weasley in Romania.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Fang

attributes.physical_description: enormous black boarhound

entities.description: Hagrid's pet boarhound. Despite his fierce appearance, he is actually a coward.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Mrs. Norris

attributes.physical_description: scrawny, dust-colored cat with bulging lamplike eyes

entities.description: Argus Filch's cat who patrols the Hogwarts corridors and alerts Filch to rule-breakers.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Trevor
entities.description: Neville Longbottom's pet toad who frequently escapes and gets lost.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Wingardium Leviosa
entities.description: A levitation charm that makes objects fly. Requires a swish and flick wand movement.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Alohomora
entities.description: A charm used to unlock doors and windows.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Petrificus Totalus
entities.description: A curse that completely paralyzes the target, binding their arms to their sides and legs together.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Locomotor Mortis
entities.description: A curse that locks the target's legs together, preventing them from walking normally.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Killing Curse
entities.description: An Unforgivable Curse that causes instant death. Produces a flash of green light. Harry is the only known survivor.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Draught of Living Death
entities.description: A powerful sleeping potion made from asphodel and wormwood.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Forgetfulness Potion
entities.description: A potion that causes the drinker to forget things. Part of the first-year Potions curriculum.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Elixir of Life
entities.description: A potion produced by the Sorcerer's Stone that makes the drinker immortal.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Attack on the Potters

attributes.outcome: James and Lily Potter killed; Voldemort's power broken; Harry survives with lightning scar

entities.description: The night Voldemort attacked the Potter family in Godric's Hollow, killing James and Lily but mysteriously failing to kill baby Harry, resulting in Voldemort's downfall.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Gringotts Break-In

attributes.outcome: Nothing stolen as vault had been emptied earlier that day by Hagrid

entities.description: An attempted robbery at Gringotts bank on the same day Hagrid retrieved the Sorcerer's Stone from vault 713.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Troll Attack on Halloween

attributes.outcome: Troll knocked out by Harry and Ron; Hermione becomes their friend

entities.description: A mountain troll was let into Hogwarts by Quirrell as a diversion. Harry and Ron saved Hermione from it, cementing their friendship.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Quidditch
entities.description: The most popular wizarding sport, played on broomsticks with four balls (Quaffle, two Bludgers, Golden Snitch) and seven players per team.

mentions.file_name: Harry Potter 1 - Harry Potter and the Sorcerer_s Stone - J. K. Rowling _ Mary Grandpre.epub

entities.name: Muggle
entities.description: A term used by wizards to describe non-magical people.
